# Web SDK Examples: Text Comparison

> These are interactive Nutrient Playground examples. Click any link to try the code in your browser.
> 
> For local runnable examples, see [web/miscellaneous/README.md](../web/miscellaneous/README.md).

---

## Text Comparison

- [Text comparison using the `loadTextComparison` method](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D)

- [Compare and highlight PDF text changes](https://github.com/jonaddams/nutrient-web-text-comparison-custom-ui)
  - Compare two PDF documents by highlighting textual differences, synchronizing their views side-by-side, and displaying a sidebar listing the detected changes.

- [Custom Text Comparison demo](https://nutrient-web-text-comparison-custom-ui.vercel.app/))
